channel.title: top10 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in top10 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: ZAPping the OWASP Top 10
item.description: This document gives an overview of the automatic and manual components provided by OWASP Zed Attack Proxy (ZAP) that are recommended for testing each of the OWASP Top Ten Project 2017 risks. Note that the OWASP Top Ten Project risks cover a wide range of underlying vulnerabilities, some of which are not really possible to test for in a completely automated way.
